name: Cathy
dialogue: So, what do you guys like to do for fun?

name: Ben
dialogue: Well, I'm a big reader. I love getting lost in a good book.

name: Ben
dialogue: Oh, all sorts of things. History, science, philosophy... You name it!

name: Cathy
dialogue: That's for sure! I'm more of a light-hearted reader myself. Give me a rom-com or a thriller any day!

name: Cathy
dialogue: Absolutely! Although, sometimes I think it's nice to have a break from reality and just get swept up in a story. What do you guys think about the impact of technology on our daily lives?

name: Ben
dialogue: Hmm, that's an interesting topic. I think technology has opened up so many doors for us, but at the same time, it can be overwhelming.

name: Cathy
dialogue: Totally agree! It's like, we're constantly connected to these devices and yet, we feel more isolated than ever. What do you guys think about social media?

name: Cathy
dialogue: Ooh, that's a great point! And what about online relationships versus in-person ones?

name: Ben
dialogue: Ah, I think there's definitely something to be said for face-to-face interactions. There's just something more real about being with someone in person.
